commit.message: don't force qt 5.15.2 on actions, update install qt to v4
Added better comment for polyline creation from selection

Dialogbox for mainwindow

In MainWindow_RunTime.cpp I set up some security question before reloading/reloading all/new project, and added the vs project files to git ignore.
Remove dialogbox from new project function

Inverting Selection mode CTRL  modifier

Changing the method of area selection tools, by holding the ctrl you can start a new selection, but the normal mode is the next selection is added to do current selection.
wraped the dialog boxes in tr()
Implementing Setting for CTRL modifier pt1
connect global params to edit select plugin
Modifier key pointer and info setup
Fix for the polyline crash tool and minor changes
